Comment: Those three weeks between the June Debate and the assassination attempt were some of the most dramatic I’ve ever witnessed during an election year.   To have all of that come after Covid/quarantine/riots/the gradual returning to “normalcy,” and on a personal note a very frightening family emergency in May/June of 2024 (they’re fine now), those three weeks were not what I had expected at all. I usually try to stay out of election year drama, but those three weeks made us turn on the news more than we had in a long time.
